channel.title: Wilderness that everyone can attack in?
channel.description: I know there's a tut on this maybe but i was wondering how to make wilderness areas so that everyone can attack each other (that it's not level sencitive) but just in some areas like my fun pk and clan wars because they are really poor when everyone must be same lv.??

item.title: Wilderness that everyone can attack in?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

laveerre:

I know there’s a tut on this maybe but i was wondering how to make wilderness areas so that everyone can attack each other (that it’s not level sencitive) but just in some areas like my fun pk and clan wars because they are really poor when everyone must be same lv.??

I have a wilderness liek that I dont no how to remove it, kinda sucks tbh >.>
